properties.areaDesc: Sandy Hook NJ to Fire Island Inlet NY out 20 nm; Long Island Sound East of New Haven CT/Port Jefferson NY; Peconic and Gardiners Bays; Fire Island Inlet NY to Moriches Inlet NY out 20 nm; Moriches Inlet NY to Montauk Point NY out 20 nm; Long Island Sound West of New Haven CT/Port Jefferson NY; New York Harbor; South Shore Bays from Jones Inlet through Shinnecock Bay
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 7 at 6:33PM EST until February 8 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Upton NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Storm Warning, west winds 30 to 35 kt with gusts
up to 50 kt and seas 10 to 15 feet. For the Gale Warning, west
winds 25 to 35 kt with gusts up to 45 kt and seas 11 to 16 feet
expected. For the Small Craft Advisory, west winds 15 to 25 kt
with gusts up to 30 kt and seas 7 to 10 feet expected.

* WHERE...The Long Island Sound, New York Harbor, Peconic and
Gardiners Bays, South Shore Bays from Jones Inlet through
Shinnecock Bay, Moriches Inlet NY to Montauk Point NY out 20
nm, Fire Island Inlet NY to Moriches Inlet NY out 20 nm, and
Sandy Hook NJ to Fire Island Inlet NY out 20 nm.

* WHEN...For the Storm Warning, until 7 PM EST this evening. For
the Gale Warning, until 7 AM EST Saturday. For the Small Craft
Advisory, from 7 AM to 1 PM EST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Very strong winds will cause hazardous seas which
could capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should remain in port, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST SATURDAY... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 1 PM EST SATURDAY
